caption: A2A Data
description: Data for the A2A record module.
name: a2a_data

protocol_versions.caption: Protocol Versions
protocol_versions.description: Versions of the A2A protocol this agent supports. For stable versions (1.x+), list only the latest supported minor version per major version. For legacy experimental versions (0.x), explicitly list each supported version.

card_data.caption: A2A Card Data
card_data.description: The A2A card data structure itself that contains information about the agent's capabilities and communication details.

capabilities.caption: Capabilities
capabilities.description: List of capabilities supported by the agent for A2A communication.

input_modes.caption: Supported Input Modes
input_modes.description: Supported input modes supported by the agent for A2A communication.

output_modes.caption: Supported Output Modes
output_modes.description: Supported output modes supported by the agent for A2A communication.

security_schemes.caption: Supported Security Schemes
security_schemes.description: Supported security schemes for A2A communication.

security.caption: Security Requirements
security.description: Security requirements for contacting the agent. Each requirement maps security scheme names to lists of scopes or requirements.

supported_interfaces.caption: Supported Interfaces
supported_interfaces.description: List of supported interfaces with URLs and protocol bindings for routing and protocol negotiation.

provider.caption: Provider Information
provider.description: Information about the provider including organization and protocol extensions.

documentation_url.caption: Documentation URL
documentation_url.description: A URL to provide additional documentation about the agent.

icon_url.caption: Icon URL
icon_url.description: An optional URL to an icon for the agent.

signatures.caption: Signatures
signatures.description: JSON Web Signatures computed for this AgentCard for verification purposes.
